text: Stadio Città di Arezzo (formerly Stadio Comunale) is a multi-purpose stadium, located in Arezzo, Tuscany, Italy. It is used mostly for football matches and is the home of the U.S. Arezzo football club. It has a grass playing surface and a 13,128-seating capacity. ==See also== *1923 in architecture *List of football stadiums in Italy Category:S.S. title: Stadio Città di Arezzo
